name: Kids Candy Maker Sweets & Food Cooking Games
name_original: Kids Candy Maker Sweets & Food Cooking Games
description:
Welcome to the sweet candy store! We make and sell various fresh and yummy candies here! Such as gummy candies, chocolate bar, and my favorite cotton candy! The candies we sell are very popular in our city!
Do you want to try these amazing sweet candies? Come on! Just come with me! Let's get start right now!
Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make yummy candies
-Three kinds of candies to make: gummy candy, chocolate bar and cotton candy
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: plate, oven, food masher, bowl, induction cooker, pot, spatula, thermometer, oven paper, mixer, freezer, spoon, cotton candy maker, candy molds, sieve, candy bag, weigh and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: peanuts, sugar, milk, cream cheese, glucose syrup, water, eggs, peanut butter, chocolate, lemon, gelatin, jello and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Take different courses for gummy candy, chocolate bar and cotton candy
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies, fruits and cream toppings
